```{r ,include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
library(sparkline)
library(DT)
library(kableExtra)
library(plotly)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE
)
options(scipen = 1e6)
```

```{r read,include=FALSE}
covid <- read_csv(here::here("data/egypt-covid-data.csv"))
```
```{r read1,include=FALSE}
covid_egypt <- covid %>% 
  filter(location == "Egypt")
```
The main dataset is of dimensions **`r dim(covid)`**, whereas that of **India** alone is **`r dim(covid_egypt)`**.
